name: Fitzrovia IT
description: Fitzrovia I.T. provides professional I.T. solutions and support for both the commercial and public sectors, particular for those IT departments seeking to enhance real-time managerial controls and provide effective contingency planning for business continuity, virtualisation and disaster recovery. Our I.T. consultancy and I.T. technical support services are delivered by highly-qualified, experienced and certified Microsoft, NeverFail and VMWare I.T. consultants.
